typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		title as string,
		year as string,
		cast as string[],
		genres as string[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	format: 'document',
	throughput: 2000) ~> source1
source1 derive(genre1 = genres[1]) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	truncate: true) ~> sink1
